original: Bomgren, Carl Erik, tandläkare, Göteborg, f. 4/12/75 i Pjätteryd, Kro-nob. 1., av kommin. Carl Anders B. o. Emelie Maria Elisabet Hultbring. G. 01 m. Elsa Fernholm. Barn: Gunnar f. 02, adv., Gbg, Bengt 05, förvalt. på Stenhammar. — Mog:ex. v. södra latin i Sthlm 94, elev h. tandl. H. Boström i Sthlm s. å., tandl :kand. 96, tandl. 97. Prakt, i Nora 97-22, i Gbg sed. 23. Skoltandl. i Nora 10’-20, mil:-tandl. v. Göta art:reg. sed. 23. Var i Nora ikd. av ^tadsfuHim., hälisov:nd, samsk:styr. o. folksk:styr.
translated: Bomgren, Carl Erik, dentist, Gothenburg, born December 4th, 1875 in Pjätteryd, Kronoberg County, son of Vicar Carl Anders B. and Emelie Maria Elisabet Hultbring. Married in 1901 to Elsa Fernholm. Children: Gunnar, born 1902, lawyer, in Gothenburg, Bengt, born 1905, manager at Stenhammar estate. Graduated from South Latin School in Stockholm in 1894, worked as a dental assistant under H. Boström in Stockholm that same year, finished dental studies in 1896, graduated as a dentist in 1897. Worked as a dentist in Nora from 1897 to 1922, then in Gothenburg from 1923. He was a school dentist in Nora from 1910-1920 and a military dentist in the Gotha Artillery Regiment from 1923. He was also involved in local government in Nora and served as a member of the health committee, the social welfare and school boards.

workExperience.name: Dental Practice in Nora
workExperience.description: Worked as a school dentist from 1910-1920
